title: PBE Sign up page is broken
body: The page won't take my information and keep saying applicationError .{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: We noticed earlier today that some of our players were having troubles getting onto the PBE signup page. We're still working on getting it back up and working correctly, but in the meantime you can try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that lets you in!
